# readthedocs Provider

Register readthedocs.org projects.

## Example Usage

```terraform
terraform {
  required_providers {
    readthedocs = {
      source = "BarnabyShearer/readthedocs"
    }
  }
}

provider "readthedocs" {
  token = "TOKEN" # optionally use READTHEDOCS_TOKEN env var
}
```

## Schema

### Optional

- **token** (String) API Token for authentication.
